double valueIfReported(double r)
Get what currentValue() would be if we reported some given value

Parameters:
r - the value to mimic reporting
Returns:
the output of currentValue() if we were to report r

countReports

long countReports()
Returns:
the total number of reports on this RunningAverage so far. Used for weighted averages, confidence/newbieness estimation etc.
